name: ruby

options.description: Enable JIT debugging (very slow), or add cflags if specified
Wait until JIT compilation finishes every time (for testing)
Save JIT temporary files in $TMP or /tmp (for testing)
Print JIT logs of level num or less to stderr (default: 0)
Max number of methods to be JIT-ed in a cache (default: 100)
Number of calls to trigger JIT (for testing, default: 10000)

tldr:
> Ruby programming language interpreter.
> More information: <https://www.ruby-lang.org>.

- Start a REPL (interactive shell):

`irb`

- Execute a Ruby script:

`ruby {{script.rb}}`

- Execute a single Ruby command in the command-line:

`ruby -e {{command}}`

- Check for syntax errors on a given Ruby script:

`ruby -c {{script.rb}}`

- Show the version of Ruby you are using:

`ruby -v`
